backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no backend logic; the application is entirely frontend-based with static content.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting five implemented features: hero section, product benefits, 7-day timeline, product details, and beauty-themed UI design with high confidence and associated test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend files describing the Glow Maxing skincare product landing page components, styling, and configuration.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base styles with custom CSS variables defining a neutral color palette using OKLCH color space for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with root div and module script reference to main.tsx for the Glow Maxing application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component that composes the full landing page by rendering Hero, ProductBenefits, ResultsTimeline, ProductDetails, and Footer sections.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component displaying Glow Maxing branding, copyright year, and attribution link to caffeine.ai with UTM tracking parameters.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Hero section with background image, animated gradient heading, 7-day transformation tagline, benefit badges, CTA button with smooth scroll, and animated scroll indicator.
Three-column grid showcasing radiant glow, blackhead removal, and whitehead elimination benefits with icons, titles, and descriptions in hoverable cards.
frontend/src/components/ProductDetails.t: Tabbed product information section with ingredients, usage instructions, and specifications alongside product image and certification badges (truncated in source).
React component displaying a 7-day transformation timeline with day-by-day progress descriptions, a before/after image, and animated timeline badges showing the product's effectiveness from cleansing to full radiance.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom React hook that manages backend actor creation using Internet Identity authentication, automatically recreating the actor when identity changes and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and auth client lifecycle with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file indicating no backend query methods are needed as all content is static and rendered from frontend components.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom OKLCH color system for light/dark modes, defining glow-themed colors, shadows, and shimmer animations for the beauty product aesthetic.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query client, Internet Identity provider, and renders the root App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending the theme with custom glow colors, OKLCH color system, container settings, animations, and typography plugins for the skincare product design.
project_state.json: Project metadata defining the Glow Maxing beauty product website with implemented features including hero section, benefits showcase, 7-day timeline, product details, and cohesive skincare-themed UI design.
